original_text: Then they all started to tell Pilate that Jesus had done bad things. They said, ‘We found this man when he was telling our people wrong things. He said that we must not pay taxes to the Roman government. He also said that he himself is the Messiah, that is, a king.’
korean_text: 고발하여 이르되 우리가 이 사람을 보매 우리 백성을 미혹하고 가이사에게 세금 바치는 것을 금하며 자칭 왕 그리스도라 하더이다 하니

sentences.original_text: Then they all started to tell Pilate
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그들이 모두 빌라도에게 말하기 시작했습니다

sentences.original_text: that Jesus had done bad things
when he was telling our people wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 우리 백성에게 잘못된 것들을 말하고 있을 때

sentences.original_text: that we must not pay taxes to the Roman government
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 로마 정부에 세금을 내지 말아야 한다고

sentences.original_text: that he himself is the Messiah
